name: Super Blob
description:
Super Blob is a fun fast paced action-arcade style game.

You control a blob who can do various tricks to maneuver under, over and in between obstacles. Along your way you will encounter power-ups to help you on your adventure however be careful of the swooping birds who are out to get you.

As you go further you will feel the speed getting faster and the obstacles getting harder, try stringing your tricks together to match the combo to gain extra points, use all the controls available to make sure your blob is triumphant!

Use the points you earn along the way to buy different colours for your blob and upgrade the effects and durations of your powerups in the shop. Try and get the highest score possible to compare with friends, race to be the first to get the rare ghost skin.
